name: Eco-Shift
description:
Eco-Shift is a tower-defense game about protecting nature from the pace of the changing world around it. With a little help from a kind painter nature will defend itself from the onslaught of those who wish to exploit and destroy it.

Towers have a Population that increases over time (as long as they're healthy!). The higher their population, the faster they attack. Be careful of invaders, some of them are hostile towards certain animals! If animals are injured, stand by them and they'll recover!

Move with WASD

Build Towers with 1-0

Sell with the minus sign ( - )

Left-Click to select of confirm tower placement

Escape and Right-Click cancel

Tab to show building grid

Survive as long as possible!

Made for My First Game Jam 2020
